mapper.select: select * from project_userpoint order by p_num desc

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (SELECT h_image1, hotel.h_num, book_review, book_indate, book_status, book_outdate, book_num, h_name, room_num, book_joindate , CONCAT(TO_DATE(book_outdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(book_indate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '박') AS day FROM project_booking book, project_hotel hotel where u_num=#{u_num} AND book.h_num = hotel.h_num order by book_num desc)A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

SELECT AA.h_image1 , AA.h_name , AA.h_grade , AA.h_address , AA.w_num , CASE WHEN ROUND(AA.reviewAvg) = 1 THEN '★☆☆☆☆' WHEN ROUND(AA.reviewAvg) = 2 THEN '★★☆☆☆' WHEN ROUND(AA.reviewAvg) = 3 THEN '★★★☆☆' WHEN ROUND(AA.reviewAvg) = 4 THEN '★★★★☆' WHEN ROUND(AA.reviewAvg) = 5 THEN '★★★★★' ELSE '☆☆☆☆☆' END AS reviewStar , NVL(AA.reviewAvg, 0) AS reviewAvg , AA.reviewCnt FROM ( SELECT hotel.h_image1 , hotel.h_name , hotel.h_grade , hotel.h_address , wishlist.w_num , (SELECT AVG(sub1.review_star) FROM project_review sub1 WHERE sub1.h_num = hotel.h_num GROUP BY sub1.h_num) AS reviewAvg , (SELECT COUNT(sub1.review_star) FROM project_review sub1 WHERE sub1.h_num = hotel.h_num) AS reviewCnt FROM project_wishlist wishlist , project_hotel hotel WHERE wishlist.u_num = #{u_num} AND wishlist.h_num = hotel.h_num ) AA
select room_type from project_room where room_num = #{room_num}
mapper.insert: insert into project_review values(project_review_seq.nextval, #{h_num}, #{u_num}, #{review_contents}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{review_image}, #{review_star}, #{review_nickname}, #{review_roomtype})
mapper.update: update project_booking set book_review=1 where book_num=#{book_num}
mapper.select: select review_image from project_review where review_num=#{review_num}
mapper.update: update project_useraccount set u_nickname = #{nickname} where u_num=#{u_num}
